ARABIC: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ لَهُ ٱلْأَسْمَآءُ ٱلْحُسْنَىٰ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Allah, there is no god but Him. The Most Beautiful Names are His.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: God: There is no god but He. To Him belong the attributes most beautiful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Allah - there is no god but He. His are the most excellent names.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God is the only Lord and to Him belong all the exalted Names.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Allah – there is no worship except for Him; His only are the best names.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Allah! There is no God but Him! To Him belong the Best Names.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Allah-- there is no god but He; His are the very best names.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: God -- there is no god but He. To Him belong the Names Most Beautiful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Allah! There is no Allah save Him. His are the most beautiful names.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: God, there is no deity but Him. His are the most excellent names.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Allah! no God there is but he! His are the names excellent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Allah—there is no god except Him—to Him belong the Best Names.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Allah! there is no god but He! To Him belong the most Beautiful Names.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Allah! La ilahla illa Huwa (none has the right to be worshipped but He)! To Him belong the Best Names.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Allah, there is no god except He. To Him belong the most Beautiful Names.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: God, there is no god but He, His are the Most Beautiful Names.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Allah - there is no deity except Him. To Him belong the best names.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:8] God — there is no god save Him. To Him belong the Most Beautiful Names, the ninety nine [Names], cited in the hadīth (al-husnā is the feminine form of al-ahsan, ‘the best’).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Allah! There is no God save Him) alone without any partner. (His are the most beautiful names) His are the most exalted attributes, so call upon Him through them.
